inn1.comm: right on target first up with one holding its line on off stump, Tharanga defends to the on side with a closed bat face
has a waft at one leaving him with the angle, feet not moving yet, and is beaten
tight line from Lee around off stump, Tharanga cautiously pats it away towards extra cover
Lee giving nothing away in terms of width, Tharanga tries to force him off the back foot but just manages to push to extra cover
Tharanga picks up the first boundary, just stands in the crease and pushes a length ball hard, and the timing is good enough to beat extra cover trying to cut it off to his left, there is no mid off
and again, a bit fuller from Lee, no movement, Tharanga hits it with a big straight followthrough through mid off
and first ball Dilshan tries to clobber him through covers but gets nowhere near connecting one leaving him off a length

this time he gets four, very well played, he was starting to lunge at this fuller one with a big backlift, then saw it was better to hang the bat and push with an open face, and timed it past a diving Lee in to the third man boundary
another one, this one is in Dilshan's slot, Bollinger goes full, goes wide, Dilshan happily plonks front foot out and crashes it through the two men around point
Dilshan is already in top gear, he looks to blast this one through extra cover, but Bollinger gets a bit of lift from a length and he is beaten
steepling bounce for Doug, close to off stump, Dilshan wisely lets it go
now he serves up the fuller one with a bit of width for the drive, Dilshan goes after it but cannot connect
plays out a length ball on the stumps towards short midwicket

quick single in front of cover as Tharanga taps a shortish one on the off side, Smith comes charging in and lobs the throw towards the stumps to have Dilshan going for the dive, but not before they collide and go sprawling on the ground, Smith looks a touch out of breath
driven off the backfoot to mid-off
goes for the whiplash pull off a marginally short ball, but cannot beat square leg
mistimes the shot as he looks to crash a length ball through cover, ball rolls away to shortish cover
goes for another big drive and mistimes a fuller delivery on to pad and to short cover

lovely shot, Tharanga picks up four for this, it looked like it would fetch him a single at the best as he came forward and pushed a length ball without any followthrough, but the timing and the outfield took care of the rest and extra cover gave up the chase in the end
goes fullish on the pads and is picked away through square leg
and troubles him with the change in angle, dropping it back of a length and hitting Dilshan on the body as he is caught on the crease, ball rolls away behind point
Tharanga is motoring along nicely now, he gets another full delivery on the pads and puts it away in front of square leg
Tharanga is middling them neatly, comes forward to a length ball and pings mid off with a firm push
well played again, he was coming forward as Doug angled the ball around middle and leg, so he stopped the movement and adjusted to clip the ball past midwicket
goes for the one in the blockhole around off, and Dilshan digs it out towards covers
Dilshan manages to get on top of a shortish ball and swivels to pull through square leg, there is a man in the deep there

goes back  and tries to punch on the off side, the ball takes the outer half and flies to third man, the bounce has been pretty true so far, and there hasn't been any movement apart from the first delivery
yet again Lee bangs in the short ball to Dilshan who goes back and cracks the pull to deep square leg
gets it off the inner half towards shortish midwicket as Lee brings it in with the angle from wide of the crease
Lee targets the stumps with the changed angle, but Tharanga brings down a closed face and gets it past short midwicket
gets well forward and tries to slap-drive past extra cover, mid off gets around and fires in the throw, but Dilshan gets home in the end
superb short ball, that must have taken a lot of effort on this wicket, flying at Tharanga's throat, who does well to get head out of harm's way, Doug gives him a stare and a word or two
chance for a run out, but Dilshan is very quick, Tharanga managed an inside edge in front of square leg, the man from midwicket charged in and let rip but Dilshan was in no trouble
for once, he quietly plays out a length ball coming in towards square leg
sends it wide down leg with the angle from round the wicket
tight delivery coming in with the angle around middle, Dilshan carefully pats it away on the leg side
another tight one from Doug to end a good over for Australia, Dilshan has no width to swing the bat and blocks down the track
what a shot, Tharanga is middling them and they are racing past the infield on this outfield, just pushes a length just outside off stump and it zooms past covers
a bit more bottom hand on this one, same result, gets a length ball off the inner half past Watson and mid on drives, but he didn't have much of a chance
steered wide of point from the crease
slows it down, that will be key on this wicket now and then, Tharanga goes back in the crease and blocks towards cover
tries to shuffle and work one from middle and leg past short fine leg but cannot beat the man
good comeback from Watson, but Sri Lanka are looking in no trouble at all, right on off stump, and Tharanga defends towards cover
bit of turn, but shortish and Dilshan backs away to cut it straight to cover, gets away this time
again some turn from outside off, he steers it with fast hands behind point
well bowled, lot fuller, bit of flight, he squeezes it back to the bowler
carefully comes on the front foot to push a tossed up ball towards covers
another good delivery, Dilshan getting impatient, tries to come down the track, but sees it dipping full and pats it away in the end back towards the bowler
better from Dilshan, he gets around a full delivery to drive with the turn to long off, but good first over from Doherty, used the flight well

this time Dilshan will get the pull to the boundary, he had been hurried by Lee's pace earlier on a few occasions, Watson's short ball comes on a touch slower and he gets on top of it and cracks it past the man in the deep to the midwicket boundary
blocks a fuller one on the off side
looks to have a go at a length ball from the back foot, sees it head for the stumps and blocks back to the bowler
Dilshan is moving about in the crease, looking for the runs all the time, here he drives a length ball off the front foot, straight to mid off
gets the single now, Watson goes with the angle on the pads and he trickles it square on the leg side
good line to Tharanga, cramping him for room with one around middle, defended from the crease
comes down the track, gets beside the line of a flatter one and reaches out to drive to long off
shuffles and works one turning in from outside off to short midwicket
a bit more fuller with the length, and Tharanga goes on the knee for the big sweep, and gets it behind square leg
Doherty strikes, Tharanga went back as he saw a marginally shortish one, it turned in sharply and beat his attempted cut to hit off stump, he was looking really good, Doherty is pumped up
superb strike first ball, Sanga comes down the track right away as Doherty tosses it up and lifts him over midwicket with the turn
shuffles well across and blocks a turning delivery down the track
turns in from outside off, steered to backward point
forces a fuller one back to the bowler
hits this one in to the leg side in front of square and comes back for the second
fires it in full, Dilshan cracks it back down the track, he is twitching for a run off every delivery
short and wide, Dilshan goes back as it hurries in, and cracks the cut well in front of point
tries to force another one through the off side, the ball is struck hard and bursts through the man at shortish extra cover
well bowled, tossing it up slowly, making him get forward, thickish outside edge towards point as it turns away
this time he tossed it in full with the angle around middle and leg, Dilshan drives with the turn to long off
bowled flatter and full outside off, he gets forward to defend towards point
fired in on the stumps, Sanga slithers across and gets it off middle stump with a nudge that flies fine on the leg side
gets down the track and pushes to long on with a straight bat
reaches out to drive a full one with the turn to sweeper cover
flicked with the turn from around middle to square leg
gentle flat shortish ball, he walks across and works it square on the leg side

Dilshan has thrown it away, he was looking increasingly impatient, got down the track as he saw some flight outside off, but was still not close enough to the ball as he blasted it straight to mid off
shortish and flat, turning in on leg stump, Mahela tickles it to long leg off the pads
tossed up full from round the stumps and  he goes forward to block
digs out a much fuller one back to the bowler
pushed down the track off the front foot
on the pads from a flat trajectory and trickles away on the leg side
gets some width and chops the cut past the man at slip
turning away from around middle and leg, he goes well back and blocks with an open face
a touch fuller around off, he comes forward to defend
squeezes one from outside off towards point with an open face
right on middle and leg from a fuller length, he goes forward to push with a straight bat to mid on
goes even fuller but on the pads and Sanga picks it to deep square leg

Australia are appealing for caught behind, it was a fullish and wide one slanted across Mahela who went for the drive, Haddin took it tumbling to his right, Australia are sure about it, umpire de Silva walks across towards square leg to check if it has carried, it has gone very low but right in to Haddin's gloves, and umpire de Silva sends Mahela back after checking with the third umpire, Johnson strikes in his first over
off the mark right away with a confident whip off the pads backward of square leg
pushed off the front foot to cover from around off stump
lets this one outside off let go through to the keeper
goes back and tucks it in front of square leg
shuffles well across outside off and blocks down the track
comes down the track but clips straight to midwicket
superb shot from Sanga, he has been using his feet a lot today, got down the track again, close to the pitch and caressed it past extra cover
again he abandons the crease, and goes leg side this time, with the turn to deep midwicket
fires it in full on leg stump, worked away behind square leg
gets well forward and stretches to squeeze a full and wide one to point
gets on top of a shortish one outside off, and is in the air as he slashes to third man
gets forward and pushes solidly, the ball races past extra cover to widish mid off
full delivery driven to mid off

Johnson has got Sanga, huge wicket, it is the slower one, bowled full close to off for the drive, mighty useful on this track, Sanga comes forward and looks to push hard. but pops it straight to short extra cover
good short delivery first up, jagging across close to the right hander who gets head out of the way quickly as he drops his wrists
gets down the track, but gets an inside edge past Ponting as he looks to go over midwicket
tossed up full, it dips a tad and he works it to midwicket
fired in full on the pads with the angle, he watchfully pats it back
that is a confident shot, down the track he comes, reaches out a bit for the tossed up ball and smacks it with the turn straight over the bowler
worked on the leg side off a very full length on leg stump
slows it down outside off as he flights it, he gets forward to smother it
bowls it full around off and Chandimal goes down the ground with a lovely straight followthrough as he eases forward
opens him up with one coming in from short of a length on middle, he blocks in the end on the off side
decides to get well forward to one slanted across him, and defends with an inside edge on the leg side
that could have been close, but he gets bat around front pad to send the pacy fullish ball racing past midwicket with a confident clip
Johnson is bowling consistently full, takes it across and beats him on the forward push

could have been close, he got across and pushed a length ball towards point, from where the throw was fired to the non-striker's, he was taking it a bit easy initially bit had to hurry across in the end

what a catch that is from Michael Clarke, Doug slanted a length ball across Chandimal who got too far across and had a poke at it, the edge went between Haddin and Clarke at wide slip who flew to his left and grabbed the ball one-handed at it almost rushed passed him, superb reflexes from the captain, Australia on top
gets forward to a pacy fullish delivery and it pops towards covers
shuffles well across to a short of a length ball and works it towards short midwicket, Doug is really charging in now
shuffles and gets on top of a shortish one that rises on him, he drops it in front of square leg and darts across
good short ball from Doug, he gets it to climb quickly at Angelo who gets outside the line, ducks a bit and hooks it wide of the keeper to the fine leg boundary
left alone outside the off stump
hits the bat hard with a length ball that kicks high in to the defensive blade of Mendis
rips it full for the leg stump, he gets bat to it just in time to clip to deep midwicket
slanted very full and wide of off, Sri Lanka are still going for the shots, Angelo goes for the drive and edges it past slip
opens him up with a length ball around off stump, off the thickish edge past point
Johnson is pumped up, he has gone through Mendis' defenses with a pacy yorker from over the stumps that swung in a bit late to clatter in to off and middle
bangs it in short of a length, it climbs on the batsman who fends it away uncertainly on the off side
Angelo continues to drive the pitched up deliveries, this one goes to mid off
this time he leaves a length ball slanted across close to off stump
now he even comes down the track looking to crash him through the off side, Johnson bowls it wider and Mathews takes one hand off the bat to send it towards extra cover
pushes a length ball to sweeper cover to bring Suraj on strike
beats him right away, with a length ball leaving him, Randiv goes a for a feeble push and does not make contact
gets forward and works a fuller one through vacant midwicket region
thickish edge as he pushes half forward to a length ball leaving him, the pace has been right up there from Mitch, ball rolls away to third man
beats him outside off as he goes for a loose push to one leaving him
goes for a push a touch away from the body to a pitched up ball and gets it down to third man
shuffles across and solidly blocks a length ball down the track
slanted across full and wide for the drive, he does not go hard at it and pushes it away towards extra cover

Angelo becomes the latest Sri Lanka batsman to throw it away, these shots are certainly not on on this pitch, he looks to come down the track and make room to clobber a pitched up delivery over mid off, but cannot clear the man, straight to him
another loose waft outside off stump, no contact with one leaving him
uncertainly looks to press half forward and defend a slanted fullish one, inside edge goes on the leg side
well played, pushes one leaving him with an open face to point
brings down a short of a length ball, almost drops it on to the stumps, they think about a single as the ball rolls on the leg side, but Dough gets to it quickly
gets well forward to drive a pitched up ball, along the ground, to extra cover
forward again, and opening the face to guide a length ball to point's left
and yet another loose drive outside off, how many  have there been today, fortunate not to get an edge off the full delivery
outside edge as he pushed at a very full one leaving him around off, but drops short of second slip
on a length now and slants it across outside off, another drive in the air
goes on middle and leg and is worked through square leg
bends it in from wide of the crease, bounces and hits him high on the bat as he keeps it down on the off side
bowls it full for the drive outside off, but his attempt to connect fails
slanted close to the off stump, and that is a good leave from Nuwan
gets this one away, one the pads and he nudges it to the fine leg boundary, brings the crowd to life after some time
another fine leave outside off from Nuwan as Bollinger looks to entice him with a length ball angled across outside off
really full and pretty widish outside off, not called one though
gets half forward and pushes a length ball in to the off side
ends the over with another well-judged leave outside off as Doug gets it to lift off a length
shot! Randiv shows how it's done, he takes a step out and clobbers a Johnson length ball over the wide long-off boundary
gets beside the line and pushes a pacy one leaving him outside off to point
a touch slower, he comes forward and bends low to push towards covers, Nuwan wants the run but is sent back rightly
now he lets the bouncer rip right on target, but Randiv gets away, it was almost on him before he decided to swat-fend it away, and got it just over Haddin running to his left
pings mid off this time with a solid drive off a length ball
squeezes out a fuller one from around off towards extra cover
and he is greeted with a thumping drive between extra cover and mid off first ball, it was pitched up and he went through with the shot
leaves a length ball outside off well alone
well played, gets forward and smothers a length ball down the track
that is a snorter from Lee, Nuwan had no chance to get out of the way as it reared up at him, off the glove and away to HAddin's right who tried hard with a full-length dive but could not get to it
pushed out towards point from the crease

Lee lets the pacy yorker rip right on middle, but Randiv manages to get something on it, was it bat or pad, Australia think it is the pad, we will have to wait for the third umpire, it hit him on the back boot as it zoomed in, now was there a bit of an inside edge before that happened? Third umpire decides in the batsman's favour, replays were not really conclusive
gets on the front foot to defend one around off stump
stretches well forward again to smother a length delivery
makes room to guide one from off stump behind point, he was gone if he had missed that
blocked down the track off the front foot
Doherty keeping it tight, around off stump and he gets forward to defend
maiden over as another tight delivery bowled slowly around off is patted down the track
makes a bit of room to guide a rising delivery from off stump to point
Lee tries the full slower one, he picks it and forces it down to long off
deep in the crease to block a short of a length ball, a touch in the air, on the leg side
drives languidly from the crease but cannot beat extra cover
almost another one, goes for a loose push from the crease as Lee slows it down a tad, but the ball drops short of extra cover
well kept out, Lee with another yorker, but Nuwan gets across and digs it back to him
gets him to drive a tossed up ball, straight to extra cover
fetches it from well outside off stump, and paddles it to the fine leg boundary, pretty effectively done
goes for another sweep but this time off the top edge, there is no one at short fine leg though, safely done
pushed back to the bowler from a full length
darts it in very full, he tries to work it away but gets it back to Doherty again
blocked off the front foot down the track
defended on the off side
width from Smith, allowing the batsman to cut through cover
fuller and straighter, played towards midwicket
defended on the front foot
blocked once again on the front foot
driven firmly but towards the bowler
just over the man at extra cover, Randiv goes over the infield, makes room and swings with the turn just over the leaping fielder
punched towards sweeper cover for a single
gets forward to the pitch of this one to drive to sweeper cover
lunges forward and drives a full delivery down to long on
turns past the outside edge, pitches off and rips past him as he presses forward
gets well forward to smother one that bounces a touch from a length
nudges off the pads wide of the man at long leg
tossed up full around middle and leg, blocked down the track

another one rips past the outside edge, he came forward to try and defend a flighted one, but it turned sharply from a length, Haddin whipped the bails off, was the foot out of the ground? Replays show it wasn't, just behind the line
flighted full and he eases it past the bowler, they come back for the second as well
solidly pushed off the front foot down to long off
drops it a touch short and flat, he goes back and hits it away to sweeper cover
gets forward and pushes in to the leg side
uses the angle, these two putting on some useful runs, gets down the track and lifts a full delivery over midwicket
shortish and punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
makes room to steer a flat delivery wide of point
shortish and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
looks to have a go initially but gets well forward to block in the end, Doherty has bowled out
shortish and wide, he is playing well here Randiv, gets on top, and cuts it past a diving Ponting at point
Lee gives him the bouncer, and is called for a wide as it sails over the batsman
pushed away off a length to point
drives a full delivery with a closed face to mid on
slower one from Lee, he is already well forward and blocks it on the off side, Lee the athlete goes after it, fields and back-lobs the ball towards the non-striker's stumps
these two have added 50 now, he goes a for a slash to a widish delivery and gets it well past Haddin
leans in to a lovely front foot drive, too bad it went straight to extra cover
plays him from the crease, and pushes a length ball towards mid off
looks to slash a pacy length ball from close to the body, gets it straight to point
now goes pushing a touch away from the body, cannot beat point again
forcing punch off the back foot to a length ball, sweeper cover gets around to it
solidly defended towards covers as a fuller one zooms in for the off stump
more solid defence from Randiv, bat and pad close together as another one heading for the stumps it kept out
carves a full and widish delivery wide of sweeper cover
slower one from Lee again, he had set himself up to have a go at it, but checked the shot a bit to send it along the ground to long off
short ball in to the body now, he deals with it quite well, swats it in front of square leg and wide of the man in the deep
right on a length on middle, but they have kept out such deliveries well, he blocks it past the non-striker and jogs out for the run, but mid on is already on to the ball
goes for the lofted shot now off a pitched up delivery, there is long off in place
squeezes out the yorker outside off to sweeper cover and goes for the single, the throw misses at the non-striker's

they have finally broken the partnership, it is Johnson again, five for him, Randiv goes for the big lofted shot down the ground off a full delivery, but mishits it high in the air and Doherty settles under it at long off and takes it cleanly
beats him with a full delivery going across outside off, he hangs the bat out to defend but is nowhere close to the ball
very full delivery outside off stump, he tries to squeeze it away but misses again
bowls the length ball on leg stump now, he goes across to play it out towards midwicket
now the short ball that takes off outside off, he manages to sway away
and gets his sixth with a slanted length ball that hits the top of off stump, Mendis just went pushing away from his body and was nowhere near the line of the ball
makes room and lofts him just over Bollinger at long off, got way outside leg stump and went for the big one, Bollinger leaped high to try and get to it but it eluded him
pushed back down the track
turning away from around middle and off, he tried to make room but then patted it away on the off side
and another one, he makes room again, goes down on a knee and lofts a full delivery with the turn over extra cover
shuffles across to work a turning ball in to the leg side
keeps it out, tossed up full, on leg stump though, and he nudges it to square leg
tries to cut from off stump, shortish one rising on him, and he is beaten
guides a length ball straight to Ponting at point
Johnson goes for the stumps with a fuller length, he makes lot of room to carve him through the off side but cannot beat point yet again
low full this time outside off, he cannot get bat to it though
gets the single off the fifth ball with a push in front of mid off from the crease
but he keeps out the full delivery slung in on the stumps with a calm forward block, the crowd likes that

superb shot, but what a catch from Mike Hussey, Lee gets his 350th ODI wicket, banged it in short and Nuwan cracked the pull right out of the middle of the bat, it was dying in front of Hussey at deep midwicket, but he dived forward to take the ball close to the ground

inn2.comm: bowls a gentle length ball some way outside off, and he shoulders arms
beats him outside off stump this time, with a similar delivery, came back in from a length a touch, Watson got forward and tried to play it with an open face
goes fuller on the pads and he plays it out on the leg side
gets on top of a length ball this time and pushes it out to point
draws him forward again, he is bowling some way outside off stump on a length, and Watson is reaching out to push in to the off side
tries to swat him down the ground with that big front foot plonked down the track, this one seams in a bit from outside off and he mistimes it back to the bowler
good delivery, there for the drive, pitched up wide outside off and moving away, he resists and shoulders arms
gets forward and blocks a fuller delivery towards point, looks for a single but there isn't any
reaches out and drives a pitched up delivery, just past short cover and they take a comfortable single, first run for Australia
bangs in the short ball, going down the leg side with the angle, Watson throws his bat at it and gets the pull in the air to the fine leg boundary
gets some width outside off and goes hard again, slashes it wide of third man
moving away after coming in with the angle on a length outside off, left alone right away
gets well forward to one coming in around middle to block down the track
another tight delivery has him defending carefully
pings mid off with the flowing front foot drive this time off a fuller one
that is typical violence from Watson, Kula bowls a length ball that gives some width to WAtson, and he pounces on it hungrily and crashes it past extra cover
brings the bat down late and guides a length ball wide of third man
gets forward and opens the face to run a length ball down to third man
goes deep in the crease to defend a back of a length ball
looks to drive a straightish delivery past the bowler, but gets the bat down at an angle and mistimes the shot
well bowled, pacy fuller delivery right on the stumps, made him defend bat and pad close together
this has disappeared, Watson sees this one pitched a bit short and latches on to it, he creams the pull so powerfully that it flies flat over the deep midwicket boundary
offers him width outside off and he cuts hard, third man is very square for him and fields
eep, Haddin decides to come charging down the track, sees this full delivery a bit away from him, and throws his bat at it, gets it in the air down to third man
comes walking down the track now, but Kula drops it shorter and he has to defend

again he looks to play from outside the crease, but goes feeling uncertainly at one that nips back in from a length, inside edge flies towards the fine leg boundary, but a diving stop there saves the run
Swatto's the word, he has really gone after this one, he is waiting for those marginally short ones, this one comes in off the seam, and he murders it way over deep midwicket
beaten outside off stump on the drive this time as Kula lures him forward with a fullish and wide one
comes in late from outside off, but Watson plays it very late and chops it down to third man
leaves this one alone outside off stump
gets forward a touch late to block one coming in with the angle from outside off
low away swinging full toss, he adjusts well to push it with a straight bat to short extra cover
bends the knee and chops a fuller one, gets it off the ground above the point fielder
goes a touch uncertainly at one some way outside off stump, and mistimes the push in to the ground
lovely delivery from Lakmal, he bowls it full in the blockhole close to off, and Haddin is lucky not to get an edge as he looks to belatedly dig it out
that has been carved, full delivery outside off, Haddin makes some room, and lifts it over covers with an open face, looks good when it comes off, but when it doesn't ...
comes in from just outside off as he flights it, defended carefully back to the bowler
shortish one going straight on, he is able to read it off the pitch, and punches it back, but Haddin cannot get out in time, and it goes off his bat to mid off
he stretches a long way forward and goes for the slog sweep off a tossed up ball, gets it wide of midwicket
beats him in the air with one that spins past the outside edge as Haddin goes forward to defend, Sanga has the bails off but Haddin had the back foot back in time
now this one spins back in, he has no clue about it, is already forward and tries to pat it away, ball sneaks in between bat and pad to somehow miss off stump
another one turns in, there is no one at short leg though, he gets forward and tries to defend, it bounces on to pad, they appeal for leg before now, not given
played out towards square leg off the pads
crash! Watson gets one pitched up, and gets on the front foot to emphatically slam it through extra cover
bends back in a tad from a length, he goes on the back foot with those two men hovering close by, and defends towards point
he goes after this one, not as short and on to him quickly, he went for the pull and got it just over mid on
they are feeding him with these lengths, short again, he is waiting for it, and eagerly smashes the pull over midwicket
there was width on this length ball, Watson got out towards it but cracked the drive straight to covers
googly turns in a long way from outside off, he shuffles outside the line and works it square on the leg side
Watson has gone after Mendis, tossed up, but a touch too full, and he gets under it to smack it over the straight boundary

dropped, that was a dolly, but it has been put down, shortish and flat outside off, he latched on to the cut a bit too eagerly and hit it straight in the air to backward point, there is a fast bowler there, it is Lakmal who clangs it
outside edge this time, but pas slip as he presses forward to a flatter one turning away
hurries on from a length, he is going deep in the crease to push to point

Haddin can't survive this over, he hasn't looked comfortable at all, tosses it up, it is the one that breaks back in, Haddin just plays all around it, probably for the one turning away, and middle stump is pegged back
almost through him, Nuwan brings it in with the angle from over the stumps, Watson goes for the drive, and almost inside edges on to the stumps
blocked carefully off the front foot towards extra cover this time
another one comes in off the seam from a length, inside edge rolls away off pad on the off side, Ponting is quick to get across for the single
that big backlift, that characteristic big shuffle forward, and a solid defensive push towards mid off
gets forward, keeps bat in front of pad and pushes one coming in to mid on
goes for a drive off a fuller one outside off, but mistimes it off the lower part of the blade in to the ground
reaches out to a fuller delivery and drives it back to the bowler
goes straigthish off a flatter trajectory outside off, diving stop at point saves the boundary off the cut
he is hoping to lunge out and not allow the ball to do much after pitching, this one spins back in and almost sneaks in between bat and pad, inside edge saved him
the method works this time, and he gets to his 50 with a forward lunge and a swung six over wide long on
defended down the track off the front foot
looks to swipe him to cow corner with a huge stride forward, connects well, just wide of the man at midwicket who gets a hand to it
goes past the outside edge, with one that does not turn much, it is the top spinner that goes past off stump

Watson is sticking to his methods and it is working well despite the odd scare, more effective against the off spinner, lunges forward, takes it on the half volley and slog sweeps way over deep midwicket
gets him to drop it marginally short and flat, and rocks back and shuffles to smoke the pull over deep midwicket, that is also 4000 ODI runs for Watson
fetches it from around middle and swings it wide of deep square leg who has to quickly get to his left to stop the ball
beats him with the top spinner again, he bowls this one well, tosses it up and has WAtson pushing inside the line

Watson has fallen, the method was bound to come undone at least off one delivery, happened this time, Randiv tossed it up around middle and leg, Watson lunged for the sweep, and got a top edge that swirled to the man at short fine leg who went a few steps back and to his left to take the ball as it came over his shoulder
gets forward to a low full toss but cannot put it away past midwicket who dives to save some runs
playing off the back foot, pushes a flat delivery to sweeper cover
whips a full delivery wristily in front of square leg
this one turned in from a fuller length, he delayed the shot to nudge it off the front foot fine on the leg side
turns in a tad from wide outside off, he gets forward, pushes it in front of point and they take a sharp run, direct hit and he was gone
gets deep in the crease to block a flattish delivery that hurries straight on
gets forward to a flighted one and eases it down with the turn to long on
leading edge as Ponting shuffles way across the stumps and tries to work him on the leg side, ball rolls along the ground towards cover
testing stuff from Randiv, tossed up full around off, turning in, played out square on the on side
gets forward to push with the turn to midwicket
Ponting survives, this was a strange shot really, tossed up delivery rushing on with overrspin, he bent the knee and tried to half-paddle it very uncertainly, top edge swirled over backward short leg
he plays this shot well, marginally short, rushing in, he quickly goes on the back foot and puts it away in front of point
pushed through quicker on the pads, and worked behind square leg
goes straight on from a length, he is a touch late on it but manages to push to point
shuffles across, waits on it, it is marginally shortish and he goes back to cut in front of point
comes down the track, gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and that is why he cannot beat mid on with the drive
leaves the crease again, better shot this time, but midwicket dives  to stop the ball
almost went to slip, Ponting looking very uncertain this time, caught in the crease, tried to work it on the leg side late as it turned in, and the ball popped up to drop short of slip
blocked off the front foot down the track
gets forward and drives with a bit of a closed face, and mid on cuts it off
slower one holding its line outside off, he adjusts and arches back to guide it past point
shuffles and tries to force a length ball with the angle through midwicket, mistimes it in front of mid on but will get the single
very low full toss, he gets to it and pushes down the track
shortish, wide, he cracks it to sweeper cover
beets him outside off with one that turns past him as he tries to push it off the back foot
tossed up, draws him forward, he gets out and smothers it off the pad
he seemed to pick this one as it turned in from a very full length, and he worked it in front of square leg
turning away, but that is short and flat outside off, Ponting is on the back foot and cuts late past backward point
goes on the back foot again and works it through square leg
Clarke gets well forward and blocks a tossed up ball
a touch short outside off, hit hard off the back foot but to the fielder at cover
fuller and wider outside off, Clarke reaches for it and drives
left alone outside of stump
Clarke steps forward, takes the ball on the full and hits it towards deep midwicket
driven off the front foot on the off side
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards square leg
Clarke stays in his crease and plays the ball towards deep square
Ponting tries to pull but the length isn't short enough and he gets beaten
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Ponting moves forward and across and nudges towards square
Ponting moves across, gets down on done knee and sweeps to long leg
skips down the track, takes it in th half volley and drives to long off
tossed up very wide and he drives away from the body wide of a diving extra cover
flat delivery turns away from back of a length, he gets back in the crease to cut to sweeper cover
another one flat,. short and wide and he slaps it off the back foot past extra cover
rips this one across the batsman from leg stump and he pushes it dwon the track
turns a long way away from the batsman but again from a shortish length, he mistimes the cut in to the ground
goes back smoothly to cut a short of a length ball to sweeper cover
again a touch short of a length, and he rocks back to pull it through square leg
lots of turn in to the batsman from round the wicket, but he is still able to punch in front of point as it is pitched short of a length
played out towards square leg
rocks back for the cut but slaps it straight to extra cover
goes deep in the crease to block a straightening shortish one
pushed away to extra cover off the front foot
down the leg side and he helps it wide of long leg with a sweep
good shot, comes down the track, gets close to the pitch and drives inside out through extra cover
draws him forward and has him pushing wide of point, Clarke does not want to go for the single
whoa, this one has taken off from a length, ripping across the outside edge as Ponting can only hold a straight bat and wonder what happened
stretches well forward to smother a fuller one this time
shuffles across to block a flighted length ball that bounces
pushed back down the track off the front foot
shuffles well across and works this one behind square leg
goes deep in the crease and plays out with the turn towards square leg
tosses it up generously, he comes down the track and drives with the turn to long on
gets in to a tangle as he looks to come forward then decides to go back and work him square, wants the single but is sent back
tossed up ball around leg stump, he leaves the crease and works him through square leg
drives off the front foot past a diving short extra cover, and the ball rolls down the ground
cuts a shortish one to sweeper cover
another one a touch short and pulled away to deep midwicket
turns away from short of a length, he cuts it away to sweeper cover
slapped away off the back foot straight to extra cover
shuffles across to work a turning delivery in front of square leg
gets bat in front of pad to work with the turn towards midwicket
gets well forward to defend down the track
stretches well forward to smother this one back to the bowler
goes for the slog sweep, and gets it off the middle of the bat, lunges forward and smacks it past square leg and in to the gap
gets forward and works on the leg side but straight to square leg
stays in the crease to punch a turning ball to sweeper cover
squared him up, he did this before to Ponting as well, spins sharply across his bat and takes the pad towards slip
the wrong 'un, but a touch short and he goes back to crack it to sweeper cover
too short and he rocks back and hammers it straight past the non-striker
tossed up ball pushed down the track
Sri Lanka appeal as he is struck on the pad on the forward push, not given, Sri Lanka decide to refer it but it would have gone way outside off stump and he was struck outside the line as well
marginally short and he latches on to the pull, Mahela at midwicket dives to save some runs
widish outside off and he hits it to sweeper cover
wide delivery down the leg side from a full length
that is a fine shot, full delivery coming in, Ponting gets forward and opens the face to place the drive between the bowler and mid off
shuffles across and eases the full delivery around middle past midwicket
low full toss driven hard but straight to mid on
nicely done, short of a length ball angled in to the batsman, who gets around it and helps it wide of long leg with a short swing
comes down the track and drives against the turn to deep midwicket
gets forward and opens the face to push towards cover
too short, too flat, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
gets forward to drive a full delivery to long off
gets out of the crease and drives with the turn down to long off
again too short and turning away sharply, he gets to it and cuts to sweeper cover
too short and turning in, smacks the pull wide of deep midwicket who saves the boundary with a dive
another short ball, does not get up much and he pulls to deep midwicket again
worked in front of square leg off the back foot
goes deep in the crease to push on the leg side
short again, they have overdone the short stuff, and they are not fast bowlers, he cracks the cut past point
short of a length and turning down leg
just a touch fuller and he cannot get the timing on the cut and chops it in to the ground
eases a full delivery back to the bowler
worked off the front foot in front of square leg
how short is that, a lot, and it is slammed down to long off
tosses it up, so he comes down the track, and drives with the turn to long off
turning away from short of a  length, hit straight to short extra cover
good shot, he skips down the track, and eases a full delivery through midwicket, the feet have moved well right from the first ball he has faced
gets around one just outside off stump and works it through square leg
down the track again and willing the ball down to long on
turning in and blocked down the track
can't put it away, turns in from short of a length but he cuts it to point
worked with the turn through square leg
turning in, he goes on the back foot to work through square leg
gets down the track yet again, and drives with the turn through extra cover
slaps the drive to sweeper cover off the front foot
cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
slapped off the back foot to extra cover
turning across, he goes back and pushes to sweeper cover
now he outdoes himself, comes down the track, and works it against the turn past midwicket, superb batting from Clarke,  he has hardly looked ruffled
turning sharply and bouncing but down the leg side
played out down the track off the front foot
abandons the crease again and works it with the turn through midwicket
again he pushes forward outside the line and works with the turn in front of square leg
right forward in solid defence down the track
that will be 50 for Ponting, there have been a few tense moments, but he has dug in resolutely and has progressed smoothly as his innings has progressed, drives this one down to long on
worked in to the leg side for a single
gets forward to defend a flat and fullish one
cuts hard but straight to backward point
this is really good batting against spin, tosses up, he comes down the track and caresses it wide of mid on against the turn
a touch short and slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
blocks a flat one around middle and leg down the track
driven with the turn down to long on to bring up the 100 stand
leaves the crease again but cannot work it past midwicket
this time he shuffles down the track and gets the work to the right of midwicket
tosses it up widish outside off, he gets forward to smother it
gets forward and across to work with the turn straight to midwicket
Ponting is gone this time, he went for the sweep from outside off but was struck on the pad and the ball trickled in to the stumps to dislodge the bail
takes it on the pads as he tries to work a flighted ball from around middle
he gets it off the middle of the bat this time and gets it down to long on
well bowled, angled in from round the stumps, and turning past his forward push
bat and pad close together as he comes forward to defend
off the mark with a punch past extra cover off the back foot
goes well back in the crease to work with the turn behind square leg
Clarke gets to his 50 with his first boundary, down the track, and lofting against the turn over wide long off, class innings
turning down the leg side and he gets a tickle fine on it
opening the face to push a tossed up ball towards point
scores are level with a work off the back foot wide of midwicket
drives off the front foot but cannot beat mid off
low full toss on the pads, but Clarke works it straight to square leg
still cannot get it, pushes straight to covers off the front foot
played back down the track off the front foot
tossed up and he lets it go outside off. now then
pegged on the back foot with one hurrying on and blocks it back
gets forward and shoulders arms to one that angles in close to off
carved straight to cover from the crease, a maiden with a run required
Clarke does it in a  way characteristic of this innings and of his general approach to spin, down the track and caresses a flighted ball with the turn between mid on and midwicket
